name: Prompt Enhancer
description: AI Prompt Enhancer is a powerful browser extension that leverages ChatGPT to intelligently improve and optimize your prompts. Whether you're generating text, writing code, or interacting with AI tools, this extension refines your input using advanced language models for clearer, more effective communication. Seamlessly integrated and easy to use, AI Prompt Enhancer helps you get the most out of ChatGPT.
